hr.fer.zemris.java.tecaj_2.jcomp.impl

Class ComputerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • hr.fer.zemris.java.tecaj_2.jcomp.impl.ComputerImpl

  • public class ComputerImpl
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to create and use a simple computer with some memory and registers. Class implements Computer interface.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    MarkoB

    • Constructor Detail

      • ComputerImpl

        public ComputerImpl(int memoryLocations,
            int registers)
        Class constructor. Constructor takes 2 integers representing the size of the memory and the number of the registers.
        Parameters:
        memoryLocations - size of the memory, an integer not lower than 1
        registers - number of the registers, an integer not lower than 1
